column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Wow... I love this place. Simply giving it 4 stars
column2: rather than 5 because I haven't DINED here
column3: yet. I've been here a couple times now
column4: after work hours and met friends for a glass of wine.  I LOVE the dim lighting and ambiance of this place.  I' d imagine a date here would be quite romantic.   A wonderful Riesling by the glass (not overly sweet) they have
